import React, {useState} from 'react' import styles from './CardBook.module.css' import Star from '../../star.svg' import Minus from '../../Icons-Vectorminus.svg' import Plus from '../../Icons-Vectorplus.svg' export const CardBook = () => { const [counter, setCounter] = useState(3) const minusCount = () => { if (counter !== 0) { setCounter(counter - 1) } } const plusCount = () => { setCounter(counter + 1) } return (

Несносное проклятье некроманта

Блинова Маргарита Фэнтези
250 ₽
{counter}
) }
